Thanks for replying. Nope- all is good now. I’m the only Mac in an office w/1,000 WinMachines. Our network guy did ‘something’ that only affected me. Once he knew, he corrected the issue. Cheers!

@Outlook My outlook mail client is experiencing real problems connecting to hotmail - tried all sorts on the PC ( and another PC) - seems to be a server side issue.
@Outlook My outlook mail client is experiencing real problems connecting to hotmail - tried all sorts on the PC ( and another PC) - seems to be a server side issue.
I believe I fixed it. I read that others were experiencing the same thing as well. Seems to have been an issue with the email being hacked and rules applied to it to erase all incoming emails.
@Outlook Seems to be broken with @Apple iOS 12.1.4 as well, so no update-issue with #iOS, rather a general problem  ! https://twitter.com/olliware/status/1110618086548406273 …
